Let's start by setting up the basic settings for screen recordings. The settings are provided in the undermentioned sections. When OBS Studio is downloaded on a specific operating system, say Windows, the user interface and on-screen functions are displayed according to Windows setup only.
The user interface and functions which can be performed on MacOS and Linux are different.
The complete knowledge base of OBS Studio can be referred from their website link:https://obsproject.com/kb after downloading the software on a specific operating system.
